description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	Be a "servant leader", helping the Dev Team and PO use Scrum to achieve the best possible for the product delivery
              
              -	Drive adoption and rollout of Agile and modern software design and engineering practices such as test driven development, continuous integration and release automation (CI/RA), and automated testing
              
              -	Plan and manage the risks, issues, costs and schedule following the Agile framework and principles
              
              -	Work closely with the Business Users / Product Owners in Sprint/Release planning to prioritize the product features and releases
              
              -	Lead the Project / Scrum team in design methods and principles, adopting a standard for issue and risk management as well as the management of the product backlog and inventory
              
              -	Provide guidance and direction to the team to ensure effective and continuous delivery pipeline with the appropriate level of automation
              

              Working conditions
              
              -	Time: 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM
              
              -	Venue: 170D/2A Phan Dang Luu, Ward 3, Phu Nhuan District , HCMC.
              

              Application
              
              -	The sooner the better
              
              -	English CV required
              
              -	CVs with photograph preferred
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or Information Systems disciplines
              
              -	At least 2 years as a Scrum Master or Agile Consultant or a Project Manager managing a Agile project
              
              -	At least 8 years of System or Software engineering with strong hands-on background in software development
              
              -	Good experience with Agile development methodology such as Scrum and KanBan;
              
              -	Excellent ability to understand business objectives and overcome business needs and challenges
              
              -	Demonstrated capability in testing, automation, development and project management
              
              -	Ability to work independently, manage stress and multi-task in a fast-paced environment
              
              -	Excellent stakeholder management skills
              
              -	Strong communication, presentation, documentation and negotiation skills in Vietnamese and English
              
              -	Scrum Master certification is a plus
              
              -	Knowledge about insurance is a plus
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
